attributes.action: Please remove Pakistan from red list.We haven’t seen our families for ages.
attributes.additional_details: India has been added later and removed earlier’why not Paksitan has been removed from the list?? even though the ratio of new cases was higher in India than Pakistan??
attributes.background: Hotel quarantine cost is so high to be afford and it has been increased further from 12 Aug. This is unfair with poor people, there should be another solution of this quarantine.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Remove Pakistan from red list for travel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581974
